ygData.subject: Re: Bard sit in or Mana Song walkout or whatever (long, possibly rant ish)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think something needs to be done.  Unfortunately, Verant doesnt have the market cornered on treating its customers like crap.  3do did the same thing
ygData.messageBody:
>The bottom line is do we care enough to put the effort in to force change?
>It is apparent that if we do not, Verant certainly will not.
>
> Kitasi the mournful bard of E'ci
>


I think something needs to be done. Unfortunately, Verant doesnt have the
market cornered on treating its customers like crap. 3do did the same thing
with M59. I remember server 105 being deliberately crashed by the players
til 3do listened to our complaints. Not that I'm advocating crashing any
servers here, but sometimes you have to "get their attention".

I'm beginning to think if we don't get Verant's attention regarding bard
issues, we will continue to be ignored, to our detriment. I'm not a rabble
rouser for the most part, but we do have legitmate issues that are not being
addressed by Verant. The final straw for me was when Verant didnt even know
our level 22 song was broken and had been for months, despite being put in
feedback all that time.

-Treehugger and Songmaker
